page.title: 17A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I wake up at 7am thanks to my alarm clock and take an annual from my cupboard and read for 25 minutes. Then I get up and get dressed. I wake my mum and dad up, take my bag down and leave it by the door. Then I bring in the milk, have my breakfast (which is usually Coco-pops),and pack my lunchbox, which consists of cheese and marmite sandwiches, a Granny Smith apple, a packet of crisps, a chocolate biscuit and a small carton of milk shake.After I have put my lunchbox in my bag, I go upstairs, wash, brush my teeth and comb my hair.Then I put on my coat and feed my rabbit and then I am usually taken to school by car.I am dropped off at school 5 minutes before the bell is rung.I put my bag in the cloakroom and go up on to the playground to play football with my friends.
